00021 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022     UsimPbEntry
00023     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00024 // class which caches one ADN entry, WString, Phonenumber, Simpos
00025 
00026 class UsimPbEntry
00027 {
00028     public:
00029         UsimPbEntry();
00030         UsimPbEntry(const UsimPbEntry & entry);
00031 
00032         ~UsimPbEntry(); // destructor not virtual !!!
00033 
00034         // the position on the SIM, by meaning the number used for the stack but starting with 0
00035         UINT16              GetRecNo() const { return m_recno; }
00036         // the alpha identifier as a WSstring
00037         const WString &     GetName() const { return m_name; }
00038         // the phonenumber of the ADN record
00039         const PhoneNumber & GetPhoneNumber() const { return m_phonenumber; }
00040         // checks if entry either contains a phonenumber and/or a wstring
00041         BOOLEAN             HasData() const;
00042         // fill the data entry
00043         void SetData(UINT16 recno, const PhoneNumber & phno, const WString & name);
00044         // clear the phonenumber and wstring but recno is still remaining
00045         void ClearData();
00046         // clears all member
00047         void ResetData();
00048 
00049         UsimPbEntry & operator = (const UsimPbEntry & entry);
00050 
00051     private:
00052         WString     m_name;
00053         PhoneNumber m_phonenumber;
00054         UINT16      m_recno;
00055 };
00056 
00057 // defines an unused sim entry pointer
00058 const UsimPbEntry * const c_unread_usim_entry = (UsimPbEntry *)-1;
00059 // defines an invalid record number
00060 const UINT16 c_invalid_usim_rec_number = ~0;
